articles.description: One key highlight of Shree Cement's Q2 performance is the improvement in capacity utilisation, which rose from 65% to 71% on a YoY basis. The results came after the close of the market hours. Shares of Shree Cement ended at ₹26,692.15, up by ₹291.75, or 1.11%…
articles.content: Leading cement company Shree Cement Ltd on Tuesday, November 7, reported a 158.95% year-on-year (YoY) jump in standalone net profit at 491.3 crore for the second quarter that ended September 30, 2023… [+2092 chars]
